text.div:
NUBC Point of Origin for Admission or Visit Value Set

These codes are found in the CMS 1450 form. See HL7 OID information.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://www.nubc.org/point-of-origin-for-admission-or-visit

name: NUBCPointOfOriginForAdmissionOrVisit
title: NUBC Point of Origin for Admission or Visit Value Set
description: These codes are found in the [CMS 1450](https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms-Items/CMS1196256) form. See HL7 OID [information](http://www.hl7.org/oid/OID_view.cfm?&Comp_OID=2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.4).
